SCRIPT.MSCRI: ! Status messages : SWITCH &$PLATFORM# : CASE "WINDOWS" cd /d &UC4RB_OSB_HOME#\tools\configjar : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Unable to change directory." : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_OSB.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMD_RETCODE@WINDOWS call setenv.bat : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR#="Error in initializing OSB environment." : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_OSB.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMD_RETCODE@WINDOWS ! set AGENT working directory : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN &UC4RB_RUN_CMD# : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR#="Error in executing the command." : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_OSB.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMD_RETCODE@WINDOWS : CASE "UNIX" cd &UC4RB_OSB_HOME#/tools/configjar : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Unable to change directory." : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_OSB.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMD_RETCODE@UNIX . ./setenv.sh : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR#="Error in initializing OSB environment." : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_OSB.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMD_RETCODE@UNIX ! set AGENT working directory : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN &UC4RB_RUN_CMD# : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR#="Error in executing the command." : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_OSB.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMD_RETCODE@UNIX : OTHER : ENDSWITCH

DOCU_Docu.DOC: This include does the following: * Sets the weblogic and OSB path along with the system properties required by OSB. * Runs the java command prepared to perform the necessary action.
